suggestions.original: To further enhance the color contrast in the artwork, consider intensifying the brightness of the yellow background to make the black dots and lines stand out even more. Additionally, you could use a more vibrant shade of green for the shirt and a deeper blue for the pants to create a stronger contrast between the figures' clothing. Introducing a few more contrasting colors, such as a bright orange or a vivid purple, in some of the shapes and patterns could also add to the visual interest and dynamic feel of the piece.
